assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Dish TV India Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides direct to home and teleport services primarily in India. It distributes its products and services through a network of distributors and dealers. As of December 30, 2020, the company offered approximately 719 channels and services, including 31 audio channels, and 76 high definition channels and services under the Dish TV, Zing, and d2h brands. The company has strategic partnership and collaboration with Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Alexa, ShortsTV, Zee5, Hungama Play, Voot, Sony Liv, and Alt Balaji to provide services to its Dish TV and d2h subscribers. Dish TV India Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Noida, India.
